metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17141 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: HylaFAX 6.0.6 and HylaFAX+ 5.6.0 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a dial-in session that provides a FAX page with the JPEG bit enabled, which is mishandled in FaxModem::writeECMData() in the faxd/CopyQuality.c++ file.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Luis Merino, Markus Vervier, and Eric Sesterhenn

criterions.comment: hylafax: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
